data.name: Into the Midnight
data.detailed_description:
Join Discord Server


About the Game

Into the Midnight is a halloween themed co-op multiplayer survival game full of mystey and fantasy. Team up with your friends, build a base, hunt creatures and survive one more day. Gather resources to craft items and structures that prepares you to surprises.

Start with nothing.


    Start with nothing and craft, hunt, explore, farm to survive.

Prepare yourself for worse.


    As the game goes, the world will be more brutal. You should prepare your base and equipments for bad days.

Resolve mysteries.


    Explore world to find mystrious structures that leads you to surprises.

Proceduraly generated worlds.


    Each time you create a game, the map will be diffirent. Also there are magical placed that leads you to procedurally generated places during playtime.

Game is over when you die.


    You can be revived someway if there is another friend who is alive. But if there isn't, the game is over. You must start from zero.

data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.2 ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
